about_the_game:
Evil hides in plain sight.

Dominic Castiel, a Vatican investigator, is sent to a remote house in Pennsylvania after an entire family vanishes without a trace. The police have found nothing. The locals whisper of strange noises and unexplained occurrences. The Vatican suspects something far worse.

As Dominic steps inside, an eerie presence watches his every move. The air is heavy, the silence unnatural. The house is waiting.

Armed with faith and determination, he must uncover the truth hidden within these walls. But how do you fight an enemy that lurks in the shadows of reality itself?

A slow-burning psychological horror where every step leads you deeper into the unknown. Are you ready to face what lies beyond?

Key Features

  • Psychological horror and mystery – Unravel a haunting narrative where reality twists into the unknown.

  • Exploration and investigation – Search every corner of the house for hidden clues, documents, and memories.

  • First-person immersion – See through Atlas Grey’s eyes as his sanity is tested.

  • Puzzle solving – Overcome obstacles and unravel cryptic messages to uncover the house’s chilling past.

  • Supernatural phenomena – Encounter unexplained occurrences that force you to question what’s real and what’s not.

Some houses are better left abandoned… but it’s too late now.

drm_notice:
DRM-free
No activation limit machine activation limit
legal_notice: This game uses third-party assets and technologies. All trademarks, logos, and brand names are the property of their respective owners.
name: Insumnius - Residence of the Damned

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 3 3300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 (3GB) / AMD Radeon RX 580 (4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K / AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060 / AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: Dominic Castiel, a Vatican investigator, is sent to a cursed house where an entire family vanished. As he uncovers the truth, he realizes this is more than a haunting—it's a gateway to hell.
supported_languages:
English*, Hungarian
*languages with full audio support
